Package steps

Class LoginSteps

java.lang.Object
steps.LoginSteps
public class LoginSteps extends Object
LoginSteps class contains step definitions for the login functionality of the application. It includes methods to interact with elements on the login page and verify their behavior. These are used in Cucumber tests.

    • createAnAccountFromThrowableMail

      public void createAnAccountFromThrowableMail() throws InterruptedException
      Step definition for creating an account using a temporary email from Yopmail. This method opens a new tab, generates a random email, and fills in the registration form.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted during sleep.
